member.name: WS_CHANNEL_PROPERTY_CONSTRAINT
member.summary: Specifies constraints for a particular channel property.Any property constraints that are not specified will use the default constraints.

summary.para: The ID of the channel property. The following channel properties constraints may be specified:

item.description:
If this property constraint is not specified when using the default constraint value of will be used.
If this property constraint is not specified not specified when using the default constraint value of will be used.
If this property constraint is not specified, the default constraint value of will be used.
If this property constraint is not specified, the default constraint of value of will be used.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_PROPERTY_CONSTRAINT.allowedValues
member.summary: An array of acceptable values. The type of the values in the array correspond to the type of the values of the channel property. See the documentation for a particular channel property to determine the type of the property.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_PROPERTY_CONSTRAINT.allowedValuesSize
member.summary: The total size of the allowedValues array, in bytes. This size must be a multiple of the size of the type of the value of the property.

member.name: WS_CHANNEL_PROPERTY_CONSTRAINT.out
member.summary: When returns NOERROR, the entire contents of this structure will be filled out.
